001package _Demos;
002
003import ij.ImagePlus;
004import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
005import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
006
007public class Filter_Demo_B implements PlugInFilter {
008        
009        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
010                return DOES_ALL;        // works for any type of image!
011        }
012
013        public void run(ImageProcessor I) {
014                float[] H = {           // this is a 1D array!
015                                1, 2, 1,
016                                2, 4, 2,
017                                1, 2, 1 
018                };
019                I.convolve(H, 3, 3);            // apply H as a 3 x 3 filter kernel
020        }
021}
